title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 156/93 of 28 January 1993 amending Regulation (EEC) No 1729/92 laying down detailed implementing rules for the specific measures for supplying the Canary Islands with products from the eggs and poultrymeat sectors, regarding the amounts of aid
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EEC) No 156/93 of 28 January 1993 amending Regulation (EEC) No 1729/92 laying down detailed implementing rules for the specific measures for supplying the Canary Islands with products from the eggs and poultrymeat sectors,  regarding the amounts of aid
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: Annex II to Regulation (EEC) No 1729/92 is replaced by the Annex to this Regulation.

This Regulation shall enter into force on 1 February 1993.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
